title: The Week In 2016 Politics
teaser: An event in New Hampshire and a small scandal in Iowa are just the latest in the race for the White House.
contentencoded:
This afternoon, Kentucky Senator Rand Paul hosts his first event in New Hampshire since indicating that he’ll announce his run for President in 2016.

And in Iowa, Wisconsin Governor Scott Walker is under scrutiny for his handling of a controversial tweet by a staffer, who insulted Iowa politics on Twitter and has since resigned.

Radio Iowa news director O. Kay Henderson and New Hampshire Public Radio political reporter Josh Rogers join Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to discuss the highlights in the race for the White House.

Guests

  • O. Kay Henderson, news director for Radio Iowa. She tweets @okayhenderson.
  • Josh Rogers, senior political reporter and editor at New Hampshire Public Radio. He tweets @joshrogersNHPR.
